actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 94-598.
Measure called up under motion to suspend rules and pass in House.
Measure passed House, amended, roll call #663 (394-7).

official_title: Resolution to authorize voluntary withholding of State income taxes in the case of Members and congressional employees.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 94-598) Authorizes the Clerk and Sergeant at Arms of the House of Representatives to enter into an agreement with any State, at the request for agreement from the proper State official, to withhold State income tax for Members and employees of the House who request such withholding. Grants the Committee on House Administration a right of disapproval of any such agreement. Sets forth guidelines for determining the effective date of any such withholding. Permits Members and employees to change or revoke such withholding.

titles.title: Resolution to authorize voluntary withholding of State income taxes in the case of Members and congressional employees.
